website_summaries.verdict: Well-made flutes by an iconic brand in crystal keepsakes. Smaller than some other options, but just as beautiful.
pros: Durable crystal flutes with flared tops and artistic-looking etchings that give the classic design contemporary appeal
cons: Some customers received the wrong set, as the flutes that were shipped weren't made of crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toasts
customer_reviews.text: Used for the bride and groom toast at my daughters wedding. They are excellent quality and a nice size for masculine hands. Really very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Our friends who were just married absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.text: These were elegant. Much nicer than I imagined they would be. Our friends who were just married absolutely loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading and I am extremely disappointed. Will be
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. What I received is not lead crystal and it's not made in the Czech Republic as advertised! The flutes I received are made in Germany and definitely not crystal. Very misleading and I am extremely disappointed. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Leonisa Upton

customer_reviews.title: lenox Adorn Flute (set of 2)
customer_reviews.text: Both glasses came intact which was a lovely relief as they were purchased for a engagement gift. Very high quality. The shipping tracking process was amazing. I knew where the product was at all times and it was at my front step on the day it was expected. I wish the box holding the flutes came in was not scuffed up though. Looks like I had the box in my basement and I just regifted. This box was inside the actual shipping box. So it shouldn't have been so scuffed up. I had no choice but to present the gift this way.
customer_reviews.author: A Morson

customer_reviews.title: How to add class to a table
customer_reviews.text: We used these flutes for my daughters engagement party. Sure helped make the table beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Summer

customer_reviews.title: and they are just beautiful. They loved them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a bride and groom to use as their toasting glasses, and they are just beautiful. They loved them, and used them for their wedding photos.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mattsson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my order. Elegant and just right for a special couple. Very happy with delivery and packaging. Once again Amazon comes through for me.
customer_reviews.author: Guess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Beatiful glasses, they were a great addition to our wedding. Ordered two sets "just in case" but they arrived perfectly packed.
customer_reviews.author: Roaddawg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful champagne flutes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace one my husband broke. They were our wedding flutes and we use them for many special occasions. This was the best price around and they're perfect! Now I have a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: This was part of an engagement gift for my son. They were boxed well. No breakage or damage. Beautuful design...
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Dembowski

customer_reviews.title: Wya to tall
customer_reviews.text: They were nice,but not what I envisioned. They were just way to tall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicate and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when my soon-to-be son-in-law asked for our blessing to marry our daughter. He even invited us (and his Mom) to be at their rented camp when he proposed (such a romantic.) The etchings on the flutes are just beautiful. Since I had little time to get them before the big proposal, I ordered them with two-day shipping. Amazon never fails!! Another plus for this pair is the Lenox guarantee to replace broken items at half-price. Most importantly of all though, the newly engaged couple loves them.
customer_reviews.author: sensible shopper

customer_reviews.title: love,love,love
customer_reviews.text: The are beautiful and the Bride loves them! so much nicer in person!
customer_reviews.author: Spring Rouch

customer_reviews.title: I loved these toasting glasses
customer_reviews.text: I loved these toasting glasses. I gave it to my niece on wedding & they loved it. I thought I was getting one of those small glasses but it's not they are perfect and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Flutes!
customer_reviews.text: These flutes were an engagement gift. They arrived to the couple in perfect condition and the bride-to-be reported to me that they are beautiful in person. I know Lenox to be high quality, overall. I am very happy with this whole transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jsurprenant

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Big Hit ! Purchased as a wedding gift for my nephew and his new bride, arrived promptly and in perfect condition. They are beautiful according to them.
customer_reviews.author: an avid seeker

customer_reviews.title: elegant flutes!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift, and the bride and groom really liked the flutes! They are very elegant! They are also sold at a local department store, but at a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

product_meta.title: Lenox Adorn Crystal 2-Piece Toasting Flute Set, Clear
product_meta.description: Size:Toasting Flutes| Style Name:Lenox Bridal Adorn GiftwareAt Lenox, we strive to make the daily moments in your life a bit more special. Inspired by heritage and designed for now, we bring a rich history of craftsmanship to modern day life. We’ve been a part of homes for over 130 years. Each time you buy Lenox, you are buying a versatile and timeless piece crafted with our century-long commitment to quality, artistry and beauty. Whether you’re gathering the family for dinner, grabbing a midnight snack for yourself in front of the TV or having friends over, Lenox is for real moments that last on products that are meant for living. The Adorn Crystal 2-piece Toasting Flute Set features a swirling tendril pattern and the Lenox standard of craft quality. It is a fitting and impressive gift for a wedding or new year's celebration.
